accessibility_changes: Added aria-label='Opções de estratégia de failover' to dropdown container
Planned to add role='menuitem' to strategy option buttons

patterns_discovered: Systematic ARIA role and label implementation for dropdown menus
Detailed tracking of accessibility subtask progress
gotchas_discovered: Dropdown menus require specific ARIA role attributes for screen reader compatibility
Interactive menu components need carefully chosen roles and labels

approach_outcome.phase: Add ARIA roles to failover strategy dropdown

recommendations: Validate accessibility changes with screen reader testing
Document ARIA implementation patterns for future components
Ensure consistency in accessibility approach across the application
